General.Name: Adriatic Metals Plc
General.Description: Adriatic Metals PLC, through its subsidiaries, engages in the exploration and development of precious and base metals. It explores for silver, zinc, lead, copper, gold, and barite deposits. The company's flagship project is the Vares Silver Project located in the Bosnia and Herzegovina. It also operates Raska Project located in Serbia. Adriatic Metals PLC was incorporated in 2017 and is based in Cheltenham, the United Kingdom.
